医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
乳腺癌试验中的药物显示出治疗血癌的潜力圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的研究人员领导的两项新研究发现了一种可能的方法，使用一种已经在乳腺癌临床试验中的药物来阻止几种形式的血癌的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Drug-in-breast-cancer-trials-shows-pottial-for-treating-blood-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Drug-in-breast-cancer-trials-shows-pottial-for-treating-blood-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a0bccd97-ad89-4eb5-8051-db822e3e90b3 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 07:26:39 -0500 Drug in breast cancer trials shows potential for treating blood cancers
美国各地饮用水污染的环境差异根据寂静之泉研究所科学家的一项新分析，近三分之一的美国人在饮用水中接触过不受管制的污染物，这可能会影响他们的健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Environmental-disparities-found-in-drinking-water-contamination-across-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Environmental-disparities-found-in-drinking-water-contamination-across-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45340b80-da04-4c71-92f4-9ca97f691943 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 07:08:34 -0500 Environmental disparities found in drinking water contamination across the U.S.
Owlstone Medical 宣布完成首轮 2700 万美元 E 轮融资Owlstone Medical（“Owlstone”）是用于早期疾病检测和精准医学应用的呼吸活检®的全球领导者，今天宣布在其 E 轮融资中首次完成 2700 万美元（约 2200 万英镑）融资。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Owlstone-Medical-announces-2427-million-USD-first-close-in-series-E-financing-round.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Owlstone-Medical-announces-2427-million-USD-first-close-in-series-E-financing-round.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90fcd842-b21b-4615-84d0-aa8fe5564b79 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 07:02:00 -0500 Owlstone Medical announces $27 million USD first close in series E financing round
新研究确定了增加衣原体风险的细菌性阴道病的关键亚型患有细菌性阴道病 (BV) 的女性通常随后会感染衣原体，这是一种常见且可能严重的性传播细菌感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/New-research-identizes-key-subtype-of-bacterial-vaginosis-that-increases-chlamydia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/New-research-identizes-key-subtype-of-bacterial-vaginosis-that-increases-chlamydia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44d8874d-1bfb-4fb4-83f8-d3cb5252d3bf Thu, 16 Jan 2025 06:52:21 -0500 New research identifies key subtype of bacterial vaginosis that increases chlamydia risk
通过机器学习彻底改变 EHR 中缺失数据的管理北京大学国家健康数据科学研究所和北京大学人民医院临床流行病学与生物统计学系的研究人员进行了全面系统的综述，评估了解决电子健康记录（EHR）中数据缺失的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Revolutionizing-missing-data-management-in-EHRs-with-machine-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Revolutionizing-missing-data-management-in-EHRs-with-machine-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e9f54ca-1fd0-40c4-a7ba-d1c8bb7a2c17 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 06:44:11 -0500 Revolutionizing missing data management in EHRs with machine learning
美国水中的 PFAS 与癌症风险增加有关一项研究将饮用水中的 PFAS 污染与癌症风险增加联系起来，强调了对消化、内分泌和呼吸系统的重大影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/PFAS-in-US-drinking-water-linked-to-increased-cancer-risk-across-multiple-organ-systems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/PFAS-in-US-drinking-water-linked-to-increased-cancer-risk-across-multiple-organ-systems.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2a4a1f98-9d8f-473d-bc64-368af7f13b55 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 06:39:00 -0500 PFAS in US water linked to increased cancer risk
桑葚提取物能否成为对抗肥胖引起的生殖功能障碍的关键？研究表明桑葚提取物可有效解决与肥胖相关的男性不育症，通过生物活性化合物增强生殖结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Could-mulberry-extract-be-the-key-to-fighting-obesity-induced-reproductive-dysfunction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Could-mulberry-extract-be-the-key-to-fighting-obesity-induced-reproductive-dysfunction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dfff3dad-963f-4036-9fee-286d13ab8230 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 06:08:00 -0500 Could mulberry extract be the key to fighting obesity-induced reproductive dysfunction?
加州新法律针对医疗债务、人工智能护理决策、拘留中心在当选总统唐纳德·特朗普的“让美国再次健康”口号下，随着美国为潜在的政策转变做好准备，美国人口最多的州和最大的医疗保健市场正在为自己的一些变化做准备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/New-California-laws-target-medical-debt-AI-care-decisions-detention-centers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/New-California-laws-target-medical-debt-AI-care-decisions-detention-centers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7860fb9c-a1a0-4f98-a69d-527218a6dcc8 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 06:02:33 -0500 New California laws target medical debt, AI care decisions, detention centers
儿童疫苗接种率是陷入困境的州罕见的健康亮点，但正在下滑珍·费舍尔能做的只有这么多，以确保她的儿子免受孩子在学校可能遇到的感染类型的影响。她说，剩下的事情就取决于家乡田纳西州富兰克林的其他学生和家长。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Childhood-vaccination-rates-a-rare-health-bright-spot-in-struggling-states-are-slipping.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/Childhood-vaccination-rates-a-rare-health-bright-spot-in-struggling-states-are-slipping.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f612591f-25aa-4d03-ba2a-b7d0a115db9b Thu, 16 Jan 2025 05:58:47 -0500 Childhood vaccination rates, a rare health bright spot in struggling states, are slipping
一种新的人工智能工具，可解开癌症空间多组学的秘密一种名为 MISO（多模态空间组学）的新型人工智能工具可以通过查看极小组织碎片的数据来检测癌症的细胞水平特征——有些组织小至 400 平方微米，相当于 5 个人的宽度头发。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/A-new-AI-tool-for-unlocking-the-secrets-of-spatial-multi-omics-in-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250116/A-new-AI-tool-for-unlocking-the-secrets-of-spatial-multi-omics-in-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50d4c5b9-9e6d-4f7d-9c62-f58e34d2cb92 Thu, 16 Jan 2025 02:27:48 -0500 A new AI tool for unlocking the secrets of spatial multi-omics in cancer
